mapper.insert: insert into orders(orderId, memId, orderProduct, orderAddr,orderSub, orderZipcode, orderPhone, amount, recipient) values(#{orderId}, #{memId},#{orderProduct},#{orderAddr}, #{orderSub}, #{orderZipcode},#{orderPhone},#{amount}, #{resipient})
mapper.select: select ifnull((select count(*) from orders), 0) as orderCount from orders union all select 0 as orderCount from dual limit 1
SELECT *, goodsNo, goodsNm, imagePath FROM orders join (select * from product where goodsNo = ${goodsNo}) where memId = #{memId} order by orderDate desc limit 5;
